The Hot Zone is a smokin' space that serves as a hub for all three Midway mini-game collections and hosts a bunch of Hot Streak Air Hockey tables (2-player real-time games). You will also find a Tele-Port-A-Potty leading to Darla's Den, a Mass Media Store ticket booth, and the Lots O' Junk Redemption Center.

The Hot Zone est un espace Smokin 'qui sert de plaque tournante pour tous les trois mini-jeux Midway collections et les hôtes d'un bouquet de Hot Streak tables de Air Hockey (2-joueurs en temps réel des jeux). Vous trouverez également une Télé-Port-A-pot conduisant à Den Darla, une cabine de communications de masse billet magasin, et les lots Centre O 'indésirable Rédemption.

The Hot Zone ist einen heißen Raum, der als Drehscheibe für alle drei Midway-Minispiel Sammlungen und Techniker ein Haufen von Hot Streak Air Hockey Tische (2-Player Echtzeit-Spiele) dient. Dort finden Sie auch eine Tele-Port-A-Potty was zu Darla 's Den, ein Mass Media Shop Kassenhäuschen, und die Viel O "Junk Redemption Center.

La zona calda è lo spazio di un smokin 'che funge da hub per tutti i Midway tre mini-game collezioni e ospita un mazzo di Hot Streak Air Hockey tabelle (2-giocatori in tempo reale giochi). Troverete anche una Tele-Port-A-Potty porta a Den Darla, una cabina di Mass Media Store biglietto, e dei Lotti O 'Centro Redemption Junk.

Usted también encontrará una Tele-Port-A-Potty que conduce a la guarida de Darla, una misa stand Media Store boleto, y los lotes O 'Centro de basura Redención.

핫존은 Midway 게임 3종 콜렉션의 본거지 역할을 하며, 또한 여러대의 Hot Streak Air Hockey 테이블(2인용 리얼타임 게임)을 운영하는 끝내주는 스페이스입니다. 여러분은 이 곳에서 매스미디어 상점 티켓 부스, 고철 덩어리 교환 센터, 달라의 집으로 향하는 텔레포트 변기를 사용할 수 있습니다.

HOT ZONE\nHot Zone是所有三個的Midway大廳迷你遊戲集合中心，並且設有許多Hot Streak Air Hockey遊戲桌(2人即時對戰遊戲)。您也可以發現可前往達拉之家的傳送站、Mass Media售票處、以及一個大量廢物兌換中心。

We are delighted to introduce an exciting sweepstakes opportunity to celebrate Midway 3 and the Hot Zone! Sign up in the Hot Zone and then every time you use your Green Ticket to play games, you will get a sweepstakes entry! There are 25 fabulous Sony prizes and a pile of money to give away too! A new prize every week! Have a ton of fun and good luck!
